resource.name: MBDA Locations
resource.description:
The mission of the Minority Business Development Agency (MBDA) is to foster the growth and global competitiveness of U.S. businesses that are minority-owned. MBDA serves as the only Federal agency dedicated to the establishment, growth and competitiveness of U.S. businesses that are minority-owned.


As a first step in making it easier for minority business owners to access our services, we are providing the information on our centers.
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'States' (d2ep-i4hs) the point in column 'full_address' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Counties' (qkpa-rtqu) the point in column 'full_address' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
